ygData.subject: RE: Re: Re: Grrrrrrrr!
ygData.msgSnippet: Nope, I m only 21st.  That aside it doesn t even say You gain experience like all the quests that give xp do when you complete them.  There is actually no
ygData.messageBody:
Nope, I'm only 21st. That aside it doesn't even say "You gain experience"
like all the quests that give xp do when you complete them. There is
actually no experience component whatsoever apparently, all you get are
three messages "What about the rest?" and the armor piece.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: Dark [mailto:jackal@...]
Sent: Wednesday, December 22, 1999 11:40 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: Re: Grrrrrrrr!


From: "Dark" <jackal@...>

You could be to high of a level to get good exp I suppose.

Naeeldar

do
>not give xp? Oh well back to questing, reading emails from home is
>painfully slow over pcanywhere. Happy Holidays!
>
> Kitasi
